description:
goprotobuf: update extension test to new signature for testing.Main.
This is an unpleasant dependency, to put it politely.

messages.text:
Hello dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://goprotobuf.googlecode.com/hg

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5310047/diff/1/compiler/testdata/extension_test.go
File compiler/testdata/extension_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5310047/diff/1/compiler/testdata/extension_test.go#newcode204
compiler/testdata/extension_test.go:204: []testing.InternalBenchmark{},
I believe these can be nils.

On Oct 19, 2011, at 3:46 PM, dsymonds@golang.org wrote:

> LGTM
> 
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5310047/diff/1/compiler/testdata/extension_test.go
> File compiler/testdata/extension_test.go (right):
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5310047/diff/1/compiler/testdata/extension_test.go#newcode204
> compiler/testdata/extension_test.go:204: []testing.InternalBenchmark{},
> I believe these can be nils.

they can be, but they're so far from home i think they're much clearer as written. objections?

-rob

On Thu, Oct 20, 2011 at 9:54 AM, Rob 'Commander' Pike <r@google.com> wrote:

> they can be, but they're so far from home i think they're much clearer as written. objections?

No objections.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf/source/detail?r=e8094a6da7be ***

goprotobuf: update extension test to new signature for testing.Main.
This is an unpleasant dependency, to put it politely.

R=dsymonds, r
